- export default function RegisterPage() {
+ 'use client'
+ 
+ import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'
+ import { useRouter, useSearchParams } from 'next/navigation'
+ import { useAuth } from '@/contexts/auth-context'
+ import { RegisterForm } from '@/app/register/_components/register-form'
+ 
+ export default function Page() {
+   const { user, register, isAuthenticated } = useAuth()
+   const searchParams = useSearchParams()
+   const redirectPath = searchParams.get('redirect') || '/'
+   const router = useRouter()
+ 
+   // ===== ç‹€æ…‹ç®¡ç† =====
+   const [errors, setErrors] = useState({})
+   const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false)
+ 
+   // ===== å‰¯ä½œç”¨è™•ç† =====
+   useEffect(() => {
+     if (isAuthenticated) {
+       router.replace(redirectPath)
+     }
+   }, [isAuthenticated, user, router, redirectPath])
+ 
+   // ===== äº‹ä»¶è™•ç†å‡½æ•¸ =====
+   const handleSubmit = async (formData) => {
+     setErrors({})
+     setIsLoading(true)
+     try {
+       const result = await register(formData)
+ 
+       if (!result.success) {
+         const errs = {}
+         const shown = {}
+ 
+         result.issues?.forEach((issue) => {
+           const field = issue.path[0]
+           if (shown[field]) return // é¿å…é‡è¤‡é¡¯ç¤ºåŒæ¬„ä½éŒ¯èª¤
+           errs[field] = issue.message
+           shown[field] = true
+         })

+         }
+

+       }
+       // è¨»å†ŠæˆåŠŸä¸åœ¨é€™è£¡è·³è½‰ï¼Œäº¤çµ¦ useEffect
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('è¨»å†ŠéŒ¯èª¤:', error)
+       setErrors({ general: 'è¨»å†Šå¤±æ•—ï¼Œè«‹ç¨å¾Œå†è©¦' })
+     } finally {
+       setIsLoading(false)
+     }
+   }

+ // ===== çµ„ä»¶åƒæ•¸å®šç¾© =====
+ export function RegisterForm({
+   className,
+   onSubmit,
+   register,
+   errors = {},
+   isLoading = false,
+   ...props
+ }) {
+   // ===== ç‹€æ…‹ç®¡ç† =====
+   const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
+     email: '',
+     password: '',
+     confirmPassword: '',
+     name: '',
+     phone: '',
+   })
+ 
+   // ===== äº‹ä»¶è™•ç†å‡½æ•¸ =====
+   const handleInputChange = (name, value) => {
+     setFormData((prev) => ({
+       ...prev,
+       [name]: value,
+     }))
+   }
+ 
+   const handleSubmit = (e) => {
+     e.preventDefault()
+     if (onSubmit) {
+       onSubmit(formData)
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   return (
